title: 3Pack RV Water Heater Anode Rod and Flush Wand - 9.25"L x 3/4" NPT Thread Magnesium Rod for Suburban and Mor-Flo, Camper Hot Water Tank Element Parts & Cleaning Rinser & Seal Tape
features: 【Water Heater Flusher & Anode Rod】You will receive 1 RV water heater tank flusher, 2 anode rods and 1 seal tape. The scale condensed on the heat pipe will become thicker and thicker, affecting the heating speed and power consumption. The flusher quickly removes lime deposits from the bottom of the water heater. And regular annual replacement of the anode rod can reduce the corrosion in the tank and extend the life of the water heater.

【High Quality Anode Rod】Our RV anode rod is made of magnesium AZ63 alloy, non-toxic and odorless. It can effectively inhibit limescale condensation on the inner wall and on the heat pipe. Regular replacement of RV hot water heater anode rod helps to avoid you from spending a lot of money to replace the RV water heater. Anode rod size is: 9 ¼" long, ¾" diameter with ¾" NPT thread, installation with 1-1/16" socket (socket not included) , Compatible with Suburban and Mor-Flo Water Heaters.

【Strong Water Flusher】This RV hot water tank flush wand tip is very small and curved to reach into the tank. The nozzle is removable and when you remove the nozzle by turning it counterclockwise, the flushers can spray water in both directions with a strong stream of water to quickly clean out all the dead spots in the tank. When you use the nozzle, you can also rotate the nozzle to change its water outlet surface to suit various occasions.

【Multifunctional Flusher】The front end of the RV tank cleaning wand is made of stainless steel with a non-skid handle. Equipped with 1/2 inch quick connect adapter and 3/4 inch garden hose adapter, it can be used directly with garden hose, which is very convenient. The metal rod section can be up to 35cm/13.7in long, you can also remove it as you need and use the 10cm/3.9in long metal nozzle alone. You can press the on/off lever and push it forward to lock it in the open position.

【Use Precautions】Before you are ready to maintain the water heater tank, be sure to turn off the water heater, cool the hot water, and release the pressure in the tank! To prevent you from injury, and splashing of sewage, please perform this operation. Wrapping PTFE seal tape around the top of the anode rod nut will allow it to be installed on the tank a little tighter.
description: Are you still asking the RV company to help you maintain the water heater tank? Did you know that you can save a lot of money on water heater replacement by simply cleaning the tank and replacing the anode rod regularly every year? Of course, they won't tell you there's a more economical way! With this water heater tank flusher and anode rod kit, you can do the maintenance yourself!

1 RV water heater tank rinser, 2 RV water heater anode rods, 1 seal tape Material: Anode Rod: Magnesium, Stainless Steel (Steel Cap) Rinser: Stainless Steel, ABS Size: Anode Rod: length 9 ¼", diameter 0.7", with ¾" thread, installed with 1-1/16" socket (socket not included) Rinser: total length 55cm/21.6in, metal rod length 35cm/14in, nozzle diameter about 16mm/0.6in, unscrewed nozzle diameter about 11mm/0.4in

1. The camper water heater anode rod is made of high quality magnesium AZ63 alloy, non-toxic and odorless.  2. When the nozzle is removed by turning it counterclockwise, there will be two water outlets perpendicular to the metal bar, with a strong water flow that can spray water in both directions. 3. When using the nozzle, you can rotate the nozzle to change the size of the water outlet to suit various occasions. 4. The rinser comes with a 1/2-inch quick connect adapter and a 3/4-inch garden hose adapter that can be attached to a garden hose for use. 5. The flusher handle is equipped with an on/off lock, you can push the on/off lever down and push it forward to lock it in the open position.

1. To prevent you from getting hurt, sewage splashing, always turn off the water heater, cool the hot water and relieve the pressure in the tank before you are ready to service the water heater tank! 2. Wrapping PTFE tape around the top of the anode rod nut will allow it to be installed on the tank a little tighter.
